programme.desc: A beautiful girl from a simple family named Nasha (Syahnaz Sadiqah). Hardworking and unassuming, Nasha works as a cleaning service in an office. One day while Nasha was working in the office, her boss Elang (Jeff Smith) passed by. For some reason, there was a misunderstanding between Nasha and Elang until they got into an argument.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta - EP 320
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Horang Kaya Dengan Kearifan Cinta Lokalnya
programme.desc: Maya's (Jennifer Eve) family suddenly gets a windfall and becomes newly rich. Maya's father, who wants a comfortable new place to live for his family, decides to buy a luxury house. On the other hand, Aryan (Fauzan Nasrul), a young man, has just returned to Indonesia from abroad. When he arrived home, he was shocked to find that his house already belonged to Maya's family. An argument ensues between Aryan and Maya's family.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2 - EP 306
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: OPEN PO CINTA SAMPAI WES ANGEL ANGEL

programme.title: Susah Banget Dah Memadamkan Api Cinta
programme.desc: Bimo (Ridho Ilahi) is a chef and restaurant owner who was saved by Luna (Shanice Margaretha) due to a fire. Bimo has just broken up with Indah because he is too focused on thinking about his restaurant. Bimo also tries to get close to Luna, the firefighter who saved his life.

programme.title: Gara Gara Gecko No Jomblo Jomblo
programme.desc: A beautiful girl (Nabila Zavira) has a phobia of lizards. That day, the girl is hit by a lizard, but she is not superstitious and will still go to Jakarta, even though her mother forbids it. But when she arrives in Jakarta, she meets a boss man (Rizky Alatas) who has a pet gecko. From there, the girl works on a roving basis while looking after Gecko. Unfortunately, when the girl looks for Gecko in the cashier's drawer, she is mistaken for a thief.

programme.title: Un Soir Au Music-Hall (Folies Bergere)
programme.desc: Bob, a GI on leave in Paris, falls in love with Claudie, dancer at the famous cabaret the Folies Bergere. He marries her, settles in Paris and begins a singing career. But as one concert tour follows another, it doesn't take long for jealousy to rear its ugly head...

programme.title: Ya Benti
programme.desc: Sabrina, lesbian, is about to marry Younes, her childhood friend, who is also gay. A marriage that suits both of them because it reassures and delights their families. But on the eve of the ceremony, Sabrina begins to have doubts.

programme.title: Des Racines Et Des Ailes - EP 2
programme.desc: Trails winding their way through the heart of the Alps, impressive mountains seemingly impossible to pass yet where goods and people have always crossed between Switzerland and Italy: Savoy is brimming with little-known treasures. Enthusiastic hikers and heritage-lovers are today working to make them better-known.

programme.title: Caraibes Sauvages, Les Rivages De La Biodiversite
programme.desc: The Antilles stretch between the two Americas, forming an arc of islands endowed with a rich and generous nature. Life, carried by wind, wave or bird took hold with tenacity. Today the beautiful but fragile Caribbean islands constitute one of the world's richest areas of biodiversity.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: La Crete, Berceau De La Mediterranee
programme.desc: Cradle of one of the oldest civilisations and veritable crossroads of the Mediterranean, Crete has been subjected to innumerable influences throughout its history, from Venetian to Ottoman and, more recently, European. The Greek island built itself a strong identity, present in its architectural, culinary and musical heritage.

programme.title: Tuamotu Sauvages - EP 3
programme.desc: Coral confetti fighting against being swamped by the sea, the atoll is a unique island world of fascinating beauty: a delicate frontier between water, land and sky. In the Tuamotu Archipelago, the land is literally born of the sea, the soul nourishing a complex community of thousands of living creatures.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Merci Professeur ! - EP 66
programme.desc: A short review of the French language, its quirks, accents and news.

programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Abers Road - EP 3
programme.desc: So far away from LA', 'Et mon pere', and 'Je pars' are just some of the songs that have made Nicolas Peyrac's name. The singer introduces Gaetan Roussel to the places that marked his childhood in St-Brice-en-Cogles, near Fougeres (Ille-et-Vilaine). The tour encompasses Tiercent, Cancale and La Pointe du Groin.

programme.title: Terra Artistika - EP 4
programme.desc: The memory of the living world, where nature is magnified and acclaimed, is masterfully portrayed in Miki Nakamura's paper artwork. Installations rich in beauty and finesse, yet never intended to make you forget that she was born in Hiroshima, Japan.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 13
programme.desc: Julien meets Fabien, Raphaelle and little Rose, a family who originally came from France to set up home with their sled dogs eight years ago. Today they live off-grid in the Yukon.

programme.title: Resistances - EP 4
programme.desc: Summer 1943; despite setbacks and lack of means, armed resistance develops to unprecedented levels. The end of 1943, de Gaulle heads the republican institutions that join forces with the resistance movement inside France. Following the allied landings, Henri Rol-Tanguy triggers an insurrection in Paris, opening the way for General Leclerc.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs - EP 30
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: La Belle Vie - EP 13
programme.desc: Julien meets Fabien, Raphaelle and little Rose, a family who originally came from France to set up home with their sled dogs eight years ago. Today they live off-grid in the Yukon.

programme.title: Littoral
programme.desc: A magazine about the people of the sea. An invitation to set sail for a programme rich in voyages, discoveries and fascinating encounters with those for whom the sea is their life, the ocean-lovers and the high-seas adventurers.

programme.title: Rocky Et Lily : C'est Dans La Boite ! - EP 90
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Edmond Et Lucy - EP 52
programme.desc: Edmond the squirrel and Lucy the bear cub grew up together. They live in a majestic chestnut tree in the heart of the forest. With their friends they solve riddles and live thrilling adventures, with every day bringing new wonders to discover in the natural world around them.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans Ca - EP 28
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo - EP 12
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Tobie Lolness - EP 2
programme.desc: Tobias and his parents are forced to run away. On arriving in the Basses Branches, a region of the Tree reputed to be wild and hostile, they discover a magnificent natural environment. Tobias meets a young girl his own age, Elisha.

programme.title: Chef Pays - EP 20
programme.desc: Chef Louise Denisot prepares a soba noodle salad with breaded avocado.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Outre-Mer, Et Si On Bougeait Les Lignes ? - EP 11
programme.desc: An exchange of views from citizens, journalists, presenters and specialists on the subjects making the news in Overseas France.

programme.title: TV5 Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Envoye Special
programme.desc: In-depth reports, investigations, unseen interviews, detailed profiles, testimonies... The current affairs show that is always on the move, up close to events and all those involved!

programme.title: Terra Artistika - EP 4
programme.desc: The memory of the living world, where nature is magnified and acclaimed, is masterfully portrayed in Miki Nakamura's paper artwork. Installations rich in beauty and finesse, yet never intended to make you forget that she was born in Hiroshima, Japan.

programme.title: Interdit Aux Chiens Et Aux Italiens
programme.desc: Northern Italy, early 20th century. With life in this mountainous region having become too difficult, Luigi Ughetto crosses the Alps to France and changes his family's destiny forever. His grandson recounts his story.

programme.title: L'attente
programme.desc: Jeanne and Celine are at the maternity clinic for the arrival of their first child. It's Jeanne who is going to give birth. During the night, in the hospital entrance hall, Celine meets two men who, like her... are waiting.

programme.title: Allegresse
programme.desc: Whilst he's supposed to be looking after his daughter, with whom he isn't particularly close, a funeral director is entrusted with the ashes of a complete unknown. Together they try to find a way to pay tribute to the deceased and end up forging unexpected ties...

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 20
programme.desc: The meeting with Gisele leaves Anemone distraught. Following an unplanned visit to Jessica's, Sebastien is worried about his ex, Louis, and insists on going to see him.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire - EP 21
programme.desc: Called by her boss for an emergency, Anemone forgets what she was doing in the house, which worries her daughters. Ron, still in hospital, receives an unexpected visit. Caroline, Sebastien and Jean-Olivier learn more about their mother's past.

programme.title: Le Grand Jt Des Territoires - EP 25
programme.desc: Up-to-date news from the French regions presented by Cyril Viguier.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Francais - 1re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'economie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel

programme.title: Au Bout De L'enquete, La Fin Du Crime Parfait ?
programme.desc: They are all cases that were closed, considered unsolvable, sometimes resisting police efforts for decades until a forgotten clue, an unhoped-for witness or a forensic innovation finally made it possible to unmask the culprit. Alongside Marie Drucker, the criminologist Alain Bauer explains the technical, psychological, sociological or historical elements involved.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Resistances - EP 3
programme.desc: British-American forces land in North Africa, the German army invades the southern zone. Early 1943, Liberation-Sud, Combat and Franc-Tireur join forces, forming the Mouvements Unis de la Resistance, under Jean Moulin. Laval approves a system of forced labour: the Service du Travail Obligatoire. Those who refuse take to the maquis.

programme.title: Chroniques D'en Haut - EP 16
programme.desc: Between Italy, the Queyras and the Embrunais stretches the Ubaye Valley. Still wild and unspoilt, the upper valley is currently seeing a renaissance thanks to the many young people choosing to settle there. Bakers, grocers, farmers: each has chosen a life in tune with their convictions, close to nature.

programme.title: Abers Road - EP 3
programme.desc: So far away from LA', 'Et mon pere', and 'Je pars' are just some of the songs that have made Nicolas Peyrac's name. The singer introduces Gaetan Roussel to the places that marked his childhood in St-Brice-en-Cogles, near Fougeres (Ille-et-Vilaine). The tour encompasses Tiercent, Cancale and La Pointe du Groin.

programme.title: 6h Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Televisions editorial team.

programme.title: Diabolo Menthe
programme.desc: Paris, 1963. It's back to school for 13-year-old Anne and her sister Frederique, who is 15. In their all-girls secondary school, the teaching method remains very strict. In spite of the rules, Frederique is interested in boys and politics. Anne, for the moment, lives in her sister's shadow.

programme.title: L'ete Des Chaleurs
programme.desc: On a hot summer's day, a mother needs a break and a child needs to exist.

programme.title: Nature Morte
programme.desc: Juliette, a policeman, joins her father Rimbaud, a farmer, in a field. One of his cows has been killed and butchered in the night. The young woman will lead the investigation.

programme.title: Tandem - EP 11
programme.desc: A body has been found in a state-owned forest, head and hands severed and burned. The victim being impossible to identify, Franck, the pathologist, visits the murder scene. The weapon used, discovered in the remains of the fire, is a tool used by foresters, lumberjacks and forest rangers.

programme.title: Tandem - EP 12
programme.desc: The investigation into the body found in the forest, head and hands severed and burned, takes a new turn. Franck, the pathologist, has disappeared after learning that his sister Zoe, a forest ranger, has been kidnapped. The search now concentrates on Zoe's laptop that has just been located.

programme.title: Movie - Gajini
programme.desc: Sanjay Ramaswamy, who is suffering from short-term memory loss, sets out on a quest to find the people responsible for his ladylove Kalpana's murder.

programme.title: Moive - Kalaba Kadhalan
programme.desc: Kanmani, who stays at her sister's house, ends up falling in love with her sister's husband and tries to romance him at any given chance. However, he plans on getting her married to his cousin.

programme.title: Movie - Bala
programme.desc: Bala, a hitman in Pasupathi's gang, is madly in love with Aarthi, the daughter of a rival gangster. Bala faces several problems when both the gangs plan to end their rivalry.

programme.title: Movie - Seerum Singangal
programme.desc: A dim-witted family moves to Ethanur to earn their living. Two daughters of a rich man, who have recently arrived in the village, use them as pawns to seek entertainment.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Vedikundu Murugesan
programme.desc: Murugesan, who has timely run-ins with the law, takes up the responsibility of a mentally unstable girl. His good-hearted nature wins him the affection of a lady constable.

programme.title: Movie - Arpudham
programme.desc: Ashok is a careless man with no respect for hard work. He falls for Priya who rejects him. When he threatens to kill himself, she reminds him that he's a nobody. He decides to make a mark for himself.

programme.title: Movie - Seethanam
programme.desc: After being released from jail, Muthu Manikkam takes on the illegal activities of a corrupt politician to settle old scores. But he faces trouble through a lawyer who does not approve of his deeds.

programme.title: Movie - Jalli Kattu
programme.desc: Arjun wishes to avenge the murder of his family, but is caught by the police and placed under house arrest. However, the judge decides to help Arjun on his path to vengeance.

programme.title: Movie - Mirudhan
programme.desc: When an intoxicated dog bites a security guard, unleashing a zombie outbreak in a hill station, Karthik, a policeman, takes up the responsibility of helping a team of doctors find the antidote.

programme.title: Movie - Guru En Aalu
programme.desc: A man who wants his boss to help him set up his company realises that his boss has eyes on the girl he loves. To achieve his ambition, he decides to make a sacrifice and get his boss and his girlfriend together.

programme.title: Movie - Krishna Krishnaa
programme.desc: Gopalakrishnan, an innocent young man, struggles to reconcile his cunning mother and Bama, his morally upright wife. However, when she suspects him of having bad habits, she decides to leave him.

programme.title: Movie - Aadikkam
programme.desc: Pandian is a cop who exploits Naga, a thug. When Naga finds out that Pandian raped a reporter, he changes his ways. Meanwhile, Pandian frames Guru for a murder so that he can marry his lover Priya.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Enga Thambi
programme.desc: Pichumani and Indu are in love, but Indu's uncle Dinakar is against their relationship. He plots against Pichumani and sends him to jail. Indu and a lawyer start investigating in order to help Pichu.

programme.title: Movie - Iraniyan
programme.desc: Iraniyan, a freedom fighter who is convicted by the British, escapes to his village. When he learns that the people of his village are being oppressed by the landlords, he decides to save them.

programme.title: Movie - Naan Petha Mahaney
programme.desc: Aandal, a possessive mother, sabotages her son's love life by attempting suicide. When she gets him married to a village girl, her possessiveness resurfaces.

programme.title: Movie - En Thangachi Padichava
programme.desc: When a police officer gets transferred to a troubled village terrorised by a wealthy landlord, he seeks the help of an ex-convict to seize the tyrant.

programme.title: Movie - Annai Kalikambal
programme.desc: Two sisters, Parvathi and Eshwari, are devotees of Goddess Kaaligaambaal. When their aunt is told that the birth of Eshwari's baby will lead to her death, she devises an evil plan.

programme.title: Hologic WTA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Bad Homburg Open is a women's professional tennis tournament held on outdoor grass courts at the Bad Homburg Tennis Club in Bad Homburg, Germany. The town is known for champaign air. 32 singles players will battle it out for the prize purse of $1,064,510. The Bad Homburg Open powered by Solarwatt is the last 500-tier event before Wimbledon.

programme.title: PGA Tour 2025
programme.desc: The Travelers Championship is a professional golf tournament on the PGA Tour in Cromwell, Connecticut, a suburb south of Hartford. Since 1984 the tournament has been held at TPC River Highlands. The tournament was founded 73 years ago in 1952. Over the last decade, longer hitters have done well at the tournament, with Stewart Cink, Hunter Mahan, J. J. Henry, Phil Mickelson, and Bubba Watson combining for six victories over a 10-year span.

programme.title: ASO Marathon Programming 2025
programme.desc: The Paris Marathon is an annual marathon hosted by the city of Paris, France. It is the largest running event in France in terms of finishers and is typically among the five largest marathons in the world.[2] The marathon begins along the Champs-Élysées, runs southeast through the city to the Bois de Vincennes, heads back through the city along the River Seine, and finishes on Avenue Foch.

programme.title: Concacaf Gold Cup 2025 Saudi Arabia vs Trinidad and Tobago
programme.desc: The 2025 Concacaf Gold Cup, hosted by Canada and the United States, is the 18th edition of the tournament, the biennial international men's soccer championship of the North, Central American and Caribbean region.

programme.title: Mass Participation 2025
programme.desc: Mass participation sports events are commonly associated with large participation numbers, usually in the tens of thousands. programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 14
programme.desc: Nemanja Vidic grew up in war-torn Serbia and went on to become one of the greatest defenders in English football. PL Stories sits down with him to explore his journey from Belgrade to Manchester. We also hear from former coaches and players about how his childhood shaped him into the person he is today and his lasting impact on the Premier League.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 34
programme.desc: Despite only featuring in one full Premier League season, in 2012/13, Miguel Perez Cuesta - AKA, Michu, remains one of the most iconic signings in Swansea City's history. Now a Sporting Director back in his homeland of Spain, Michu looks back on his time in the Premier League which saw him achieve cult status in South Wales, as well as reflect on what could have been but for injuries that saw his playing career cruelly cut short.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2012/2013 (GB:RVP)
programme.desc: We take a look back at some of the most spectacular and important goals from previous Premier League seasons.

programme.title: CLASSIC MATCH 12/13
programme.desc: We delve into the Premier League archive to bring you a Classic Match from the 2012/2013 season.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 37
programme.desc: This week on PL Rewind we bring you highlights from some of the most memorable North London Derby clashes between Arsenal and Tottenham.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 38
programme.desc: After a meteoric rise through Cardiff's youth system, Aaron Ramsey's dream of playing for one of the world's biggest clubs was realised. But just as his career was reaching new heights, a devastating double leg break threatened to bring it all crashing down. The Wales captain takes us through his footballing journey to date.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 34
programme.desc: Despite only featuring in one full Premier League season, in 2012/13, Miguel Perez Cuesta - AKA, Michu, remains one of the most iconic signings in Swansea City's history. Now a Sporting Director back in his homeland of Spain, Michu looks back on his time in the Premier League which saw him achieve cult status in South Wales, as well as reflect on what could have been but for injuries that saw his playing career cruelly cut short.

programme.title: GOALS OF THE SEASON - 2012/2013 (GB:RVP)
programme.desc: We take a look back at some of the most spectacular and important goals from previous Premier League seasons.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 27
programme.desc: Coming from a successful footballing family, Javier Hernandez was somewhat destined for football stardom. Chicharito talks us through his fairytale move to Manchester United as well as his return to Mexico and his hometown team, Club Deportivo Guadalajara.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS - EP 2
programme.desc: Paul Scholes looks back on his outstanding career as he selects his personal top ten Premier League moments.

programme.title: REVIEW - SUN 01 DEC
programme.desc: Highlights of all the fixtures from Matchweek 13 of the Premier League League. Including Chelsea at home to Aston Villa, Manchester United against Everton, and Tottenham, who host Fulham at White Hart Lane.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 47
programme.desc: We look back on the extraordinary career of Mohamed Salah, tracing his rise from a small village in Egypt to global football stardom. We speak to those closest to him to highlight his early years, struggles, and determination, shedding light on the pivotal moments that shaped his journey to becoming a Premier League legend with Liverpool.

programme.desc: Some of the Premier League's biggest stars take us onto the pitch to discuss the techniques and thought processes that allow them to perform at the highest level. Featuring Morgan Rogers, Joelinton, Martin Odegaard and Ryan Gravenberch.

programme.desc: Highlights of all the fixtures from Matchweek 13 of the Premier League League. Including Chelsea at home to Aston Villa, Manchester United against Everton, and Tottenham, who host Fulham at White Hart Lane.

programme.title: REVIEW OF THE SEASON - 2024/2025 (LIV)
programme.desc: Relive another extraordinary Premier League campaign as Liverpool soared to an historic 20th league title, Nottingham Forest defied expectations and the promoted sides were strenuously challenged. There were also tactical transformations, shifts in narrative trends, and a more open field than ever before. Review of the Season documents all of the thrilling stories to emerge across the 380 matches.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 52
programme.desc: We dive into the fiercest rivalry in English football-Manchester United and Liverpool. As Liverpool draw level with United's record haul of top-flight titles, this is a story of history, pride, and the relentless pursuit of greatness. With insight from icons on both sides-Ian Rush, Lou Macari, Brian Kidd, Michael Owen, Phil Thompson, and new Liverpool boss Arne Slot, we unpack the moments that have defined generations, split families, and lit up the Premier League.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 32
programme.desc: As Thomas Tuchel begins his journey as England's new manager, PL Stories dives into his journey to the top, tracing his rise from playing career to football management. After facing financial struggles and working in a bar, Tuchel's determination led him to become one of the Premier League's most respected managers. We showcase his unique path, blending hard work, passion, and tactical innovation to reach the pinnacle of football.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 17
programme.desc: The man who orchestrated Chelsea's greatest ever night in a famous double winning spell as caretaker manager, Roberto Di Matteo sits down with PL Stories to reflect on winning the Champions League and FA Cup in 2012, whilst he also reminisces on the 90s and his time in the heart of the Blues midfield.

programme.desc: We take a look at the career of Philippe Coutinho, tracing his journey from a promising young talent to one of the Premier League's most skilful and dynamic players. We join Coutinho at his current club Vasco da Gama and reflect on his time in Europe, from his rise at Liverpool to his time at Barcelona, Bayern Munich and Aston Villa. Delving into his passion, creativity, and legacy, we celebrate how his flair and vision have left a lasting mark on the Premier League.

programme.title: PL REWIND - EP 16
programme.desc: Once part of a dominant Manchester United side in the 1990s, Peter Schmeichel is one of the Premier League's most decorated goalkeepers. The Dane looks back at some of the memorable moments from his remarkable career, including a famous victory over his beloved United when he was Number 1 for their bitter city rivals.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 12
programme.desc: He was Villa's penalty saving hero in the 90s and the man tasked by Fergie to replace the legendary Peter Schmeichel at Manchester United. Former Australian number one, Mark Bosnich welcomes PL Stories down under as he reflects on his career in England's top-flight.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 15
programme.desc: With over 200 appearances for Everton, Tim Cahill established himself as the high-energy midfielder who helped drive the side. For PL Stories this week, Cahill talks through his journey to the Premier League from battling his way to make it as a footballer in his native Australia, leaving home as a teenager and adapting to English life, scoring in a World Cup as well as the difficult decision to leave Goodison Park after 8 years.

programme.title: PL STORIES - EP 2
programme.desc: We chart the rise of Portuguese star Rúben Dias, from his early days in Portugal to the heart of Manchester City's defence. We meet the family, friends, and coaches who shaped his journey, offering a rare glimpse into the upbringing and mindset that forged a Premier League leader. Then, in Manchester, Rúben reflects on his career so far, his impact at City, and the values that continue to drive him on.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA
programme.desc: The 16th Annual Fighters Only World MMA Awards are back this month on FIGHT SPORTSR, hosted again by one of the most entertaining personalities in MMA, Chael Sonnen and taking place at the Theater at the Virgin Hotels in Las Vegas. The event has become an annual tradition to honor the best fighters and moments in MMA over the previous year, including awards for male and female Fighter of the Year, Knockout of the Year, Fight of the Year, and many, many more.

programme.title: WCCB Frank Martin vs. Artem Harutyunyan
programme.desc: Undefeated future star Frank "The Ghost" Martin takes on undefeated Olympic Bronze Medalist Artem Harutyunyan in a WBC Lightweight World Title eliminator. In the co-feature Elvis Rodriguez meets former world champion Viktor Postol on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we look at different weapons used throughout the martial arts and the technology used to make them stronger and more efficient.

programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode, we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Paris as some of the 2016 Olympics' finest athletes battle for their shot at glory.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Adrien Broner vs. Jason Litzau
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is then-undefeated Adrien Broner taking on Jason Litzau in a fight that ends with a first-round TKO. Also on the card, action from light welterweight champ Amir Khan.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 2 from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan features Terunofuji, Tobizaru, Ryuden and Tamawashi.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Dozens of contestants converge in the Big D to compete on a redesigned course, featuring new obstacles the Tilting Table and Ring Toss!

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Jean Pascal vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a Light Heavyweight Unification battle as WBO Champion Jean Pascal (25-1, 16 KOs) takes on undefeated IBO Champion, Chad Dawson, (29-0, 17 KOs) on August 14, 2010 at the Bell Centre in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. The fight ends in a decision after a controverial headbutt.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Floyd Mayweather vs. Felipe Garcia
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another exciting Greatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. One of the all-time greats is featured just one year from making his pro debut, as a 10-0 "Pretty Boy"Floyd Mayweather - long before he became "Money" - has a tough test against Felipe Garcia of Mexico.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBC welterweight title bout between Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Victor Ortiz, which generated $78 million in pay-per-view revenue from 1.25 million buys. Also on the card, action from super welterweight champ James Kirkland and Alfredo Angulo.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 3 from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan feature Hokutofuji, Todushoryu, Hoshoryu and Endo.

programme.title: Karate 1 Premier League
programme.desc: Fukuoka, Japan welcomes the top talent in the world of martial arts when Karate 1 Premier League returns. Fukuoka will host athletes from across the globe including last season's Grand Winners such as Hikaru Ono and Ayaka Saito competing in their home country. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League visits the port city of Fukuoka, Japan, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode is highlighted by a heartfelt interview with the legendary MMA Hall of Famer Tito Ortiz that shows you sides of the former champ you never knew from his childhood to his love of fishing to the man he is today. We stop by "Cowboy" Donald Cerrone's ranch to see you don't need the flashiest training equipment to be a world class fighter. Plus Nate Marquardt gets his dream car and UFC ring girls bring us on a tour of a new gym.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Brendan Lesar
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of the interim Middleweight Championship as Garreth 'SoldierBoy' McLellan and Brendan 'Descendant' Lesar meet in the hexagon. Bonus coverage includes Matunga Djikasa vs. Ivan Strydom and Devon Cronje vs. Guy Mongambi.

The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League visits the port city of Fukuoka, Japan, on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: MMA:30
programme.desc: This episode is highlighted by a heartfelt interview with the legendary MMA Hall of Famer Tito Ortiz that shows you sides of the former champ you never knew from his childhood to his love of fishing to the man he is today. We stop by "Cowboy" Donald Cerrone's ranch to see you don't need the flashiest training equipment to be a world class fighter. Plus Nate Marquardt gets his dream car and UFC ring girls bring us on a tour of a new gym.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Garreth McLellan vs. Brendan Lesar
programme.desc: This episode features coverage of the interim Middleweight Championship as Garreth 'SoldierBoy' McLellan and Brendan 'Descendant' Lesar meet in the hexagon. Bonus coverage includes Matunga Djikasa vs. Ivan Strydom and Devon Cronje vs. Guy Mongambi.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Jean Pascal vs. Chad Dawson
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a Light Heavyweight Unification battle as WBO Champion Jean Pascal (25-1, 16 KOs) takes on undefeated IBO Champion, Chad Dawson, (29-0, 17 KOs) on August 14, 2010 at the Bell Centre in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. The fight ends in a decision after a controverial headbutt.

programme.title: Greatest Classics Floyd Mayweather vs. Felipe Garcia
programme.desc: FIGHT SPORTS presents another exciting Greatest Classics episode, bringing you more action featuring the greatest fighters in boxing history. One of the all-time greats is featured just one year from making his pro debut, as a 10-0 "Pretty Boy"Floyd Mayweather - long before he became "Money" - has a tough test against Felipe Garcia of Mexico.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Floyd Mayweather, Jr. vs. Victor Ortiz
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a WBC welterweight title bout between Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Victor Ortiz, which generated $78 million in pay-per-view revenue from 1.25 million buys. Also on the card, action from super welterweight champ James Kirkland and Alfredo Angulo.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 3 from Ryogoku Kokugikan in Tokyo, Japan feature Hokutofuji, Todushoryu, Hoshoryu and Endo.

programme.title: BWF Martial Arts

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Juan Diaz

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S1 - EP 21

programme.title: Meet The Neighbours S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: The social experiment has reached its halfway point, and despite the trails and tribulations the new residents are proving their worth to a town grateful to have them.

programme.title: Wide Open Spaces (2021) - EP 2
programme.desc: Hard people for a hard land. Narriearra Station sprawls across 150,000 hectares in a remote New South Wales. After more than a century its becoming a national park rich in flora and fauna and Indigenous and pastoral history.

programme.title: On Country Kitchen S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: It's season 2 and Derek still can't cook! With locally found ingredients, and a sprinkle of culture and character, Mark and Derek create an Indigenous-inspired feast for the people they visit along their journey.

programme.title: Good Tucker S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: Suren and Matt head to Australia's first drive thru kebab shop, Mustafas.

programme.title: This Place (2019) - EP 18
programme.desc: Kabi Kabi man, Kerry Neill shares the Aboriginal dreaming story behind popular tourist destinations on the Sunshine Coast, Queensland. In this story we discover how the black swan helped Maroochydore gain its name.

programme.title: Landline (2025) - EP 19
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Offsiders (2025) - EP 20
programme.desc: Abbey Gelmi and a panel of leading sporting minds examine the latest news and action, both on and off the field, from the AFL, NRL, the fallout from State of Origin Game 2, plus the Super Rugby Grand Final and Super Netball.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show S5 - EP 18
programme.desc: Join Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes for your weekly hit of Pacific joy, as they share inspiring stories and incredible sporting prowess of athletes with Pacific Island heritage, from Australia and around the world.

programme.title: News Breakfast (2025) - EP 124
programme.desc: As each day begins get the facts you need to stay informed. Bridget Brennan and James Glenday present the latest news, overnight developments and today's top stories, joined by Emma Rebellato, Catherine Murphy and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings (2025) - EP 124
programme.desc: Stay in the know with what's happening this morning. ABC News brings you up-to-the-minute news to fuel your daily conversations so you can stay connected and follow the discussion across the day. Presented by Gemma Veness.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon (2025) - EP 124
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Kathryn Robinson brings you today's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter most.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw S5 - EP 55
programme.desc: It's Easy Entertaining, Chinese banquet style! Acclaimed chef Tony Tan and acclaimed comedian Jennifer Wong join Adam for a dinner party feast.

programme.title: This Place (2019) - EP 20
programme.desc: Clarence Wyles Jnr is a ranger and proud Warrgamay man with a deep connection to his country and ancestors. He shares his knowledge of Broadwater, where his 'old people' washed away negativity by swimming in the water.

programme.title: ABC News Regional (2025) - EP 21
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: The Homes That Built Australia S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: Cyclones, floods, droughts; the all-mighty forces of nature devastate our homes and lives, showing how we must design and work with the land - or ignore it at our own peril.

programme.title: Heywire (2023) - EP 4
programme.desc: Heywire winner Rania has bones as brittle as glass. She can't walk around her Cocos Island home, but through her advocacy, she's making the tropical island more accessible.

programme.title: Grand Designs Transformations S1 - EP 4
programme.desc: A dilapidated 1960s duplex in the Blue Mountains gets a Moroccan makeover, while in Sydney can a giant boulder the size of a backyard be transformed into a rock top, poolside paradise?

Recognizing that only he can set his father straight, this inventive kid puts an end to their plans and makes Ray do time...as a dad!

programme.title: Meet The Press 2025
programme.desc: Meet the Press is America's most-watched and No. 1 Sunday morning public affairs broadcast. Every Sunday morning for more than 70 years, millions of Americans have tuned in to get answers from U.S. and world leaders, and to hear analysis, discussion and review of the week's political events from noted journalists and experts.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon 2025
programme.desc: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon made its debut from Studio 6B in Rockefeller Center on Feb. 17, 2014. Emmy Award- and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings a high-tempo energy to the storied NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Europe Early Edition
programme.desc: Start your trading day with Europe Early Edition as major European financial centres take the reins of global markets. Get the first indication of how markets in Europe will react to an active Asian session and the handover from the US. With breaking news, key earnings and data, as well as interviews with market makers and C-Suite executives from across the globe, Europe Early Edition is essential viewing to be prepared for the day’s session.

programme.desc: It’s one hour until the opening bell in Europe and Squawk Box Europe has everything you need to prepare for the first trade. programme.title: Reality Trip
programme.desc: Follow five young adults as they leave their comfortable lifestyles behind to go on the Reality Trip of a lifetime! Travelling to Sri Lanka, Bangladesh and the Phillippines, the group learn the origins of their favourite brands. From working in cotton fields under a blazing sun, to sleeping on cardboard beds alongside the factory workers; this is a world they were not prepared for. Sparks fly between the group as stress and emotions take over.

programme.desc: Discover London uncovers hidden gems, guided by an experienced London Black Taxi driver and respected 'Knowledge of London' tutor, and a youthful Londoner seeking to learn more about her city.

programme.title: Duo Backpackers
programme.desc: The journey of two travelers to magnificent hidden places across the islands of Indonesia.

programme.title: Side Walk
programme.desc: This program discusses the traditional food with its history, by bringing chefs from some restaurants / hotels that create innovations from the cuisine. programme.title: Tough Trains
programme.desc: Tough Trains takes viewers on some of the most epic and hard-core train journeys on the planet. Trips that should take hours often take days, and nights that should be spent in towns are spent aboard tough trains.

programme.title: The Longest Day
programme.desc: Climate change is more than a set of abstract projections and statistics. It's the daily reality for millions of people across the world, living on the frontlines of the climate crisis. The Longest Day is a snapshot of the climate crisis in action - told through the voices of farmers, health workers, city residents and displaced families.

programme.title: Seafood
programme.desc: SEAfood will explore the culinary richness around Indonesia, delivered by narrative voice over and combined with face to face interviews with seller or the "chef".

programme.title: Stories Of Taste S2
programme.desc: Stories of Taste will provide a new perspective about the taste of unique cuisines across the cities in Indonesia. Take an in-depth look at the struggles and history of the owners in building and creating great food or restaurants.

programme.title: Kaya Rasa
programme.desc: A documentary program that discussesabout a journey of a chef who explores a secret ingredient in a dish.

programme.title: Hungry Hour
programme.desc: Street food is not just a matter of taste but also a story. Culinary recommendations that are delicious and suitable for anyone.

programme.title: Secret For A Healthy Life S4
programme.desc: A program that tells the inspiring story of a healthy life practitioner who has experienced a history of illness. He or she will share stories about their journey and also their secrets to fighting to heal or survive.

programme.title: Wellness Stories
programme.desc: Inspires people to relate to the emotion of the moment. Captures the wellness of life and the excitement of doing a healthy lifestyle. Spread spirit and happiness. Wellness is related to local wisdom too.

programme.title: Living In Harmony
programme.desc: Living in Harmony is a program about comfortable living homes designed according to the character of the owner. We believe that every home is ideal for its owner, hence every home has a different feel.

programme.title: Luxe Asia S2
programme.desc: Each episode focuses on a particular theme, be it homes, holidays or toys of the super-wealthy. It's Asia like you've never seen before - dripping in grandeur and extravagance, ready for anyone with deep enough pockets. Join host Anita Kapoor on a journey across the beautiful Asian continent, exploring the latest in luxury in Hong Kong, Sri Lanka, the Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, China, and Abu Dhabi.

programme.title: Teman Bicara
programme.desc: Indy Barends wants to share stories with his inspirational friends that can motivate people to be successful.

programme.title: Animalpedia
programme.desc: A program for animal lovers. Everything you need to know about each animal that will be featured in this program.

programme.title: Vet Tales
programme.desc: Follow the daily ups and downs of two enthusiastic and entertaining New Zealand veterinarians - Dr Mark Young and Dr Stacey Tremain. These long-time friends graduated vet school together 20 years ago. Mark is now a rural vet working with large animals and Stacey works in a busy animal hospital dealing with smaller patients.

programme.title: Dr Lisa To The Rescue S2
programme.desc: Emergency vet Dr. Lisa Chimes ventures out of the surgery room to raise awareness about animal welfare in this compassionate pet rescue series. Lisa's mission is to encourage potential pet owners to adopt rescue animals from shelters rather than support puppy mills or backyard breeders.

programme.title: Bonding Buddy
programme.desc: The unusual closeness between humans and their pets is unique in itself.

programme.title: The Land Of Spices
programme.desc: Indonesia is famous for its rich spices. This program provides an in-depth insight into each spice, its benefits for life and health. All information is conveyed in a modern yet humorous way.

programme.title: Exploring Nusantara With Kristian Hansen
programme.desc: Showcasing spectacular journey like you've never seen it before! Join with Kristian Hansen on non-stop journey one of Asia's most exotic and breath-taking nations Indonesia. Crossingmotorcycle journey from Sabang to Merauke to show you historic, cultural, people and insights alongside tantalising food and drinks, this show will inspire you and learn more about Indonesia.

programme.title: 2-Hour News Show (Live)

programme.title: The Travel Note

programme.title: Wild Cage
programme.desc: Indonesia's wildlife is incredibly diverse, with a variety of unique and spectacular wildlife living in Indonesia. programme.title: Apose Bos Baru
programme.desc: After the drama of losing his job, Andre tries to return to being Surya's assistant. But this time, he has to go through a probation period. Meanwhile, Dicky also loses his job due to a scandal. Now the vacant CEO position is filled by an unexpected figure, Ayu Ting Ting.

programme.title: Buddy Talk
programme.desc: Buddy Talk is one of our flagship programs which combines quick news headlines, talkshow, digital trends, sports, lifestyle, and entertainment news.

programme.title: NHK Amateur Singing Contest "Kameyama City, Mie Prefecture" (R)
programme.desc: A very popular live program on a Sunday afternoon held at different towns and cities around Japan. Guest singers will also join in for support.

programme.title: Special Drama "Amagi Pass" (R)
programme.desc: A 30-year-old unsolved mystery reignites a fierce confrontation between a relentless veteran police detective Tajima (Kishitani Goro) and Mochizuki Jiro (Hagiwara Masato), a man who has erased the truth from his memory. This is the essence of a Matsumoto Seicho mystery-where human love, sin, and fate converge into a grand tragedy!

programme.title: What the Villains Have to Say
programme.desc: Cockroaches, Carbon dioxide, Unwanted hair... Villains are anathema to the public as being "dirty, noxious, and ugly." But even villains have a point they want you to hear! In this program, we look at their amazing abilities revealed by the latest research, as well as the real villains, who are actually a little bit fascinating!

programme.title: SCIENCE ZERO
programme.desc: A scientific information program which explains the latest research, disasters and accidents from scientific aspects with a virtual set in the studio.

programme.title: Fish Masters
programme.desc: A variety program exploring the mysterious world of fish with the fish expert Sakana-kun.

programme.title: Natural Grandeur of the East Mini
World Weather

programme.title: Historical Drama "UNBOUND" Eps. 24 (R)
programme.desc: With the support from the elders in Yoshiwara, Tsutaju begins preparations to purchase a shop in Nihonbashi. However, Tei (Hashimoto Ai) of Maruya refuses to sell, unwilling to accept Tsutaju because of his origins in Yoshiwara. Meanwhile, Tagasode connects Tosaku and Hirotane to gather evidence of smuggling by the Matsumae Domain.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE (R)
programme.desc: Let's look into the world of Ukiyoe to learn how people lived in Edo period!

programme.title: World Weather

programme.title: News: Good Morning, Japan

programme.title: Drama Serial "Anpan" Week 61
programme.desc: This is a story based on the lives of Yanase Takashi (Kitamura Takumi), the creator of "Anpanman," a famous Japanese anime character, and his wife Nobu (Imada Mio). It depicts how two individuals overcame countless hardships to create "Anpanman," embodying the idea of 'justice that never wavers,' and inspiring love and courage that make the joy of living well up from within.

programme.title: Project X: The Challengers-New Beginnings "Godzilla and the 35 Pirates" (R)
programme.desc: Project X returns for the first time in 18 years. The former series featured people involved in project related to the Japanese industry and contemporary history. The new series focuses on people in the "Lost Era" following the collapse of the bubble economy. In every era, there are always those take on challenges. Even without receiving praise or being in the spotlight, some dedicate themselves to their work. The documentary delivers passion and courage right to you.

programme.title: City-Scope (R)
programme.desc: This program solves little mysteries we encounter in the town every day, making use of time-warping and clairvoyant power of the special goggle 'city-scope'.

programme.title: Drama 10 "The Great Passage: I'll Make a Dictionary" Eps. 1 (New) (R)
programme.desc: Kishibe Midori (Ikeda Elaiza), an editor for a popular fashion magazine, finds herself transferring to the lexicography division following the magazine's discontinuation. The place is filled with a group of quirky characters, led by Majime Mitsuya (Noda Yojiro), a boss with a shaggy hair who is extremely serious. While being tossed about by them, Midori is influenced by their patience and passion for making a dictionary which takes over a decade, and she gradually immerses herself in the work.

programme.desc: The program invites doctors from different fields to talk about big and small things about doctors, break the stereotype of doctors and provide audiences with information on medical health from a relaxed and pleasant perspective!

programme.title: Chic Cities - EP 832
programme.desc: Covering consumer shopping information, trendy specialty stores, travel guides, and the LOHAS propositions of trendy people.

programme.title: Taiwan Criminal Files - EP 1381
programme.desc: Discuss the difficult inside story behind the news events, lead the audience to explore the development of the event from an objective perspective, and strive to enlighten the audience's new thinking.

programme.title: Travel Together - EP 535
programme.desc: A real-life working travel show, each trip is led by Dou Zhikong and Wang Chuan-yi, who are composed of a "handsome working group" of artist guests. They travel together to get away from the hustle and bustle of the city and explore the most healing rural secrets.

programme.title: ShinyFoodDiary - EP 80
programme.desc: The host visits various places in a walking and themed way, focusing on what is most fashionable among young people nowadays.Check in on FB and IG to create new highlights and online clicks, not only delicious food, but also in-depth introduction.Introduce the cultural customs and festivals of various places.

programme.title: All Star Quiz Show - EP 1060
programme.desc: The puzzle reality program, with the curator Sam Tseng as the knowledge gatekeeper, tests every artist star who comes to challenge the Jiugongge puzzle game. If you want to conquer the Jiugongge level, through creative association, logical reasoning, and rational analysis, you will have the opportunity to obtain wisdom stars and take away the dream prize.

programme.desc: Hosted by Dee Hsu, the most queenly artist in the entertainment industry, and partnered with the humorous assistant host Patrick, each episode invites many of the most popular and topical artists and Internet celebrities to appear on the show. Through Dee Hsu Her profound and spicy hosting skills stirred up unparalleled "laughter" with the guests.

programme.title: Let's Debate
programme.desc: The new reality debate show "Let's Debate" is hosted by Tao Ching-Ying and Chen Zi-Jian, who respectively serve as the host and chief judge. Kimberley Chen and Huang Hao-Ping lead teams as captains. The program invites numerous celebrities and internet personalities as guests, dividing them into two teams for debate competitions. Through the format of debate, the show aims to stimulate everyone's focus on critical thinking, expression, and listening skills, while exploring diverse issues.

programme.title: Young Charioteers - EP 6
programme.desc: At high school, YAU TAT (Him Law) and YIP FAI-TING (Sammy Sum) became good friends during a cycling race, but FAI-TING returned to Taiwan due to a family emergency. The two have lost contact with each other until one day they reunite at an accounting firm. TAT's supervisor LING HEI (Lin Xiawei) often manipulates office politics and sows discord amongst colleagues, making TAT and FAI-TING bear a grudge against each other.

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 31
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 13
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: SAFE GUARDS - EP 22

Although it appears to be a strong company, its business is dying. The new head SHEUNG CHI (MA CHUN WAI, STEVEN) decides to reform it._x000D__x000D_ CHI is the adopted son of the family. His background and aggressive reform cause disputes at Wui Yau.

It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 13
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 14
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: SAFE GUARDS - EP 22
programme.desc: The Wui Yau Safety Service is very renowned during the mid Qing Dynasty. It earns respects from officials, businessmen and triads across the country. Although it appears to be a strong company, its business is dying. The new head SHEUNG CHI (MA CHUN WAI, STEVEN) decides to reform it._x000D__x000D_ CHI is the adopted son of the family. His background and aggressive reform cause disputes at Wui Yau.

programme.title: SAFE GUARDS - EP 23
programme.desc: The Wui Yau Safety Service is very renowned during the mid Qing Dynasty. It earns respects from officials, businessmen and triads across the country. Although it appears to be a strong company, its business is dying. The new head SHEUNG CHI (MA CHUN WAI, STEVEN) decides to reform it._x000D__x000D_ CHI is the adopted son of the family. His background and aggressive reform cause disputes at Wui Yau.

programme.title: Young Charioteers - EP 5
programme.desc: At high school, YAU TAT (Him Law) and YIP FAI-TING (Sammy Sum) became good friends during a cycling race, but FAI-TING returned to Taiwan due to a family emergency. The two have lost contact with each other until one day they reunite at an accounting firm. TAT's supervisor LING HEI (Lin Xiawei) often manipulates office politics and sows discord amongst colleagues, making TAT and FAI-TING bear a grudge against each other.

programme.title: My Lover From The Planet Meow - EP 31
programme.desc: MIU MIU-MIU (Kristal Tin), originally from the Planet Meow, applies to live on Earth in a humanoid form to help solve the growing marriage problems between a physicist named SIT DING-KAP (Moses Chan) and CHIU YIU (Nancy Wu) so as to avoid the negative effects on her young master, SIT SZE-SZE (Celine Yeung). It turns out that, ten years ago, MIU-MIU took the appearance of a cat to be the pet of SIT's family and established a close bond with them.

programme.title: Confidant, The - EP 13
programme.desc: Owing to the destitution during their youth, LI LIAN-YING (Lai Yiu Cheung) and AN DE-HAI (Raymond Cho) have presented themselves as eunuchs in the court, where they serve their apprenticeship with an old eunuch LAU DOR-SANG (Chung King Fai). Having closely bonded to one another, the two respectively played dominant roles during the rule of Empress Dowager CIXI (Michelle Yim).

programme.title: SAFE GUARDS - EP 23
programme.desc: The Wui Yau Safety Service is very renowned during the mid Qing Dynasty. It earns respects from officials, businessmen and triads across the country. Although it appears to be a strong company, its business is dying. The new head SHEUNG CHI (MA CHUN WAI, STEVEN) decides to reform it._x000D__x000D_ CHI is the adopted son of the family. His background and aggressive reform cause disputes at Wui Yau.

programme.title: KUNG FU MASTER, THE - EP 1
programme.desc: During the Ching Dynasty under the throne of Hong Hei, there was a `Kung Fu Contest`, once the sensation of the martial world. NGAU FEI (KWOK JING HUNG) represents the Manchu tribe while TAM TIN (YUEN WAH) represents the Han Tribe. The balance of power was destroyed when TIN was being set up during the competition. TIN lost in the contest. TIN`s father was so irritated that he died throwing up blood. Since then TIN is very depressed and pessimistic. He becomes a coward.

programme.title: Fly With Me - EP 20
programme.desc: LEUNG HAU-CHI (Choi Siu Fun, Ada), a career woman in her 30s, has all the attributes of a typical Hong Kong girl - fussy, arrogant and easily irritated by the sight of beautiful young ladies. She is desperate for love and has been eagerly waiting for the thrilling miracles of life. As CHI is plunged into misery and despair, something strange happens and leads to her abrupt transformation into a superwoman of charm and immense strength.

programme.title: Stranger Anniversary - EP 11
programme.desc: A "doppelgangers" website has facilitated the connection between two complete strangers that look like identical twins. Law firm partner Ko Sau-shing (Joe Ma) tracks down his former lover Yu Fung (Roxanne Tong), whom he has not contacted for ages, online, and Yu Fung is looking for a part-time boyfriend with a similar appearance to him. Sau-shing arbitrarily approaches applicant Mo Kei-nam (also Joe Ma), who is a dead ringer for him. The duo also covertly agree to swap identities for two weeks.

programme.title: Men Don't Cry - EP 17
programme.desc: With the support of the head of the Police Authority, Guangzhou’s top villain HO KEI-KIN (Wong Tze Wah) has been riding roughshod over everyone around him. He is so manipulative that he has explored every possible means in his fight for a house with the buck-toothed owner LING YUK-TSUI (Cecilia Yip). TSUI is happy to have met the upright and honorable WONG FEI-HUNG (Lam Kar Wah). The pair quickly falls in love and even feels ready for marriage.

programme.title: Wong Fei Hung - Master Of Kung Fu - EP 25
programme.desc: WONG FEI HUNG (WONG CHUNG CHAK, BOSCO) represents justice. His sayings and behavior in his youth already tell the world that he would rise to fame one day._x000D__x000D_ After his mother’s death, HUNG follows his father WONG KEI YING (KEUNG TAI WAI), whose nickname is "Guangdong Tiger", to earn a living by performing Kung Fu. After many years, they return to their home village in Foshan. HUNG’s heroic nature attracts MOK KWAI LAN (LI CHOI WA, RAIN) and they become lovers.

programme.title: Greed Of Man, The - EP 1
programme.desc: Honest broker Sun (Lau Chung Yan) had known Hai (Adam Cheng) for over ten years. However, Hai accidentally killed Sun and escaped to Taiwan, leaving Sun’s four children fatherless. Sun’s girlfriend then strove to bring up the children. Ten years later, the eldest son, Pok (Lau Ching Wan), finally grew up. However, he was very lazy. Sun’s friend, Tin (Law Lok Lam), then helped him and gradually, he did gain some achievements.

programme.title: KUNG FU MASTER, THE - EP 1
programme.desc: During the Ching Dynasty under the throne of Hong Hei, there was a `Kung Fu Contest`, once the sensation of the martial world.
